order by id desc limit #{startNum}, #{pageSize}

select a.id, a.ci_collection_id AS ciCollectionId, a.start_time AS startTime, a.end_time AS endTime, a.input_from AS inputFrom, a.status, a.transaction_group_id AS transactionGroupId, a.server_id AS serverID, a.error AS error from cmdb_sync_audit a join cmdb_sync_ci_collection b on a.ci_collection_id = b.id where b.ci_id = #{value} and a.status = 'doing'
